# LabeledContentStyle.Configuration

**Type Alias**

The properties of a labeled content instance.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Configuration = LabeledContentStyleConfiguration
```

## Creating custom labeled content styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view that represents the body of labeled content.
- **Body**: A view that represents the appearance and behavior of labeled content.

items.description: Creates a view that represents the body of labeled content.
items.name: makeBody(configuration:)

items.description: A view that represents the appearance and behavior of labeled content.
items.name: Body
